data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Name an activity that you think improves physical health. Why do you think more people should do that activity? How could we encourage more people to do it?
data.answer: Regular physical activity is one of the most important things we can do for our health. Being physically active can improve our brain health, help manage weight, reduce the risk of disease, strengthen bones and muscles, and improve our ability to do everyday activities. Adults who sit less and play tennis can gain some health benefits. Only a few lifestyle choices have as large an impact on your health as playing tennis. Everyone can experience the health benefits of playing tennis – age, abilities, ethnicity, shape, or size do not matter. We can encourage more people to play tennis by raising awareness of the benefits of tennis, so more people may start playing tennis.
